content: To classify the technologies, I will use the `classify_risks` function to map the provided list of technologies to their corresponding risk categories. This will help us understand which technologies relate to which risk categories. I will begin by processing the list step by step and classifying each technology accordingly.

function_call.name: classify_risks
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Data analytics for indoor environments","category":"Data Analytics","confidence":"High"},{"name":"24-hour mechanical ventilation systems","category":"Air Control","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"General-performance filters","category":"Air Control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Commercial package-type air conditioners","category":"Air Control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fan coil units","category":"Air Control","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Air conditioners with directional airflow control","category":"Air Control","confidence":"Medium-high"}]}
